benchmark_details.name: VN-MTEB (Vietnamese Massive Text Embedding Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: VN-MTEB is a substantial benchmark consisting of 41 datasets from 6 tasks (retrieval, reranking, classification, clustering, pair classification, and semantic textual similarity), designed to evaluate text embeddings for the Vietnamese language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create a large-scale benchmark for comparing different text embedding models in Vietnamese.

data.source: Translated datasets from the Massive Text Embedding Benchmark into Vietnamese.
data.annotation: Automatically translated and filtered using a new automated framework.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation done through similarity scoring between queries and document embeddings using cosine similarity.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance of embedding models in the benchmark tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Results from 18 embedding models averaged from 41 datasets across 6 tasks.
methodology.validation: Datasets validated through a filtering pipeline ensuring high-quality translations.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: CC BY 4.0 and other licenses as specified per dataset.
